name: 劉英彥
objective:
設計工學（Engineering Design）是一門跨學科的領域，結合工程學和設計學的原理，旨在創造功能性、美觀且實用的產品、系統和服務。其核心在於利用科學和工程知識解決實際問題，並通過創意設計滿足用戶需求。

本課程旨在培養學生設計工學的綜合能力，涵蓋從設計規劃、服務串接、配置發展、整合設計、設計驗證到工業化的設計理論與方法應用。

課程將以工學原理為基礎，從設計流程展開，對接最新的設計趨勢，如可持續設計、數位製造、物聯網、虛擬與擴增實境（VR/AR）和用戶體驗設計等技術。這些新技術正在擴展設計工學的專業範疇。課程將通過實際演練方式加深學生對這些概念的理解。

Engineering Design is an interdisciplinary field that combines principles from engineering and design to create functional, aesthetically pleasing, and practical products, systems, and services. Its core lies in using scientific and engineering knowledge to solve real-world problems and meet user needs through creative design.

This course aims to develop students' skills in design engineering, covering design planning, service integration, configuration development, integrated design, design verification, and industrial design.

The course follows engineering principles and design processes, connecting with trends like sustainable design, digital manufacturing, IoT, VR/AR, and user experience design. These technologies expand the scope of design engineering. Through practical applications, this course will deepen students' understanding of these concepts.
